verse:
एवं यदुपतिं कृष्णं भागवतप्रवरो मुनिः ।
प्रणिपत्याभ्यनुज्ञातो ययौ तद्दर्शनोत्सवः ॥

vedabase.translation: After killing the demon Keśī in battle, the Supreme Personality of Godhead continued to tend the cows and other animals in the company of His joyful cowherd boyfriends. Thus He brought happiness to all the residents of Vṛndāvana.

terms.भागवतप्रवरो: the best among devotees of the Lord
terms.तद्दर्शनोत्सवः: to the festive occasion of seeing Him

bard.meaning: god govinda also killing keshi in war cows protected by the cowherds happily go back happily bringgod govinda also killed keshi in war and protected the cows happily, so go back happily
